title: Josep Borrell - Wikipedia
snippet: Josep Borrell Fontelles (Western Catalan: [dʒuˈzɛb boˈreʎ fonˈteʎes]; born 24 April 1947) is a Spanish politician who served as High Representative of the Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy and Vice-President of the European Commission from 2019 to 2024.

title: Appointment of Josep Borrell as Vice-President of the European Commission and High-Representative of the Union for Foreign Policy and Security Policy – European Sources Online
snippet: Reports, analyses and information on the appointment of Spain's Josep Borrell Fontelles as Vice-President in the European Commission led by Ursula von der Leyen, which also becomes the European Union's High Representative for Foreign Policy and Security Policy · Further information:

title: Josep Borrell begins his term as President of CIDOB | CIDOB
snippet: CIDOB Apr 02 2025 · Following his appointment by the institution’s Board on 13 December, the former head of European diplomacy has begun his agenda as President of CIDOB, a leading think tank in international relations based in Barcelona.
